createdFromImportJournalId.description: Gets the if of the Import that created this party.

currencyCode.description: Gets or sets the currency code.

dateOfBirth.description: Gets or sets the date of birth.

deliveryTerm.description: Gets or sets the delivery term.

departmentCode.description: Gets or sets the code of the Department this customer belongs to.

discountPercent.description: Gets or sets the fixed discount percent for this customer, this value should be between 0 and 100. Can also be used to add a premium in percent of the sales price (usually markup) by having negative number. Negative numbers can be between -1000 and 0.

externalImportReference.description: Gets or sets an external import reference that is unique within the account type (Customer, Supplier, Employee). It can be edited by any integration - at any time. Max length is 50 characters.

firstName.description: Gets or sets the first name.

hourlyRate.description: Gets or sets the hourly rate to use when billing time to the Customer.

internationalIdCountryCode.description: Gets or sets the international ID country code. Country code is given in ISO 3166-1 alfa-2 standard (Two characters).

internationalIdNumber.description: Gets or sets the international ID number. For privacy reasons queries returns 'hidden' if this field has a value and null if it's empty.

internationalIdType.description: Gets or sets the international ID type. The type is not well documented. See https://api.poweroffice.net/Web/docs/index.html#Reference/Rest/Type_Customer.md

invoiceBrandingThemeCode.description: Gets or sets the code of the BrandingTheme used when sending invoices to this customer. If NULL, the clients default branding theme will be used.

lastName.description: Gets or sets the last name.

mailAddress.description: Gets or sets the mail/postal address.

noticeOfDebtCollectionDeliveryType.description: Gets or sets how notice of debt collection should be delivered to the customer.

ourReferenceEmployeeCode.description: Gets or sets the code of the Employee of the sales person handling this customer (Our reference).

paymentTerms.description: Gets or sets the payment terms. This is the default number of days after an invoice sent to this customer is due.

reminderDeliveryType.description: Gets or sets the how reminders should be delivered to the customer.

reportInternationalId.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether International ID should be reported to Altinn.

socialSecurityNumber.description: Sets the social security number. For privacy reasons queries returns 'hidden' if this field has a value and null if it's empty.

subledgerNumberSeriesId.description: Sets the id to the SubledgerNumberSeries the party should be applied to when creating it.
